00026     {
00027         const float CollisionResponsePositioner::VERY_CLOSE = 0.1f;
00028         const int CollisionResponsePositioner::MAX_STEPS = 10;
00029         const float CollisionResponsePositioner::SLIP_LIMIT = 0.1f;
00030 
00031         void CollisionResponsePositioner::loadData(TiXmlElement *element)
00032         {
00033                         Vector2D::fromXML(element->FirstChildElement("gravity"), &gravity);
00034             element->QueryFloatAttribute("jumpdistancelimit",
00035                     &jumpDistanceLimit);
00036         }
00037 
00038         CollisionResponsePositioner::CollisionResponsePositioner(Entity *entity)
00039                         : Affector(entity)
00040         {
00041             setGravity(Vector2D(0.0f, 0.0f));
00042             jumpDistanceLimit = 100.0f;
00043         }
00044 
00045         CollisionResponsePositioner::CollisionResponsePositioner(Entity *entity,
00046                 TiXmlElement *element)
00047                         : Affector(entity)
00048         {
00049             setGravity(Vector2D(0.0f, 0.0f));
00050             jumpDistanceLimit = 100.0f;
00051             load(element);
00052         }

00055         {
00056         }

00058         const Vector2D &CollisionResponsePositioner::getGravity() const
00059         {
00060             return gravity;
00061         }
00062 
00063         void CollisionResponsePositioner::setGravity(const Vector2D &gravity)
00064         {
00065             this->gravity = gravity;
00066         }

00068 
00069         void CollisionResponsePositioner::affect(float ms)
00070         {
00071             Entity *entity = getEntity();
00072             CollisionDetector *collisionDetector =
00073                     entity->getLevel()->getCollisionDetector();
00074 
00075             /* Store the original ms. */
00076             float timeLeft = 1.0f;
00077 
00078             /* Get vectors. */
00079             Vector2D position = entity->getPosition();
00080             Vector2D velocity = entity->getVelocity() * ms;
00081 
00082             /* Used later. */
00083             Vector2D destination;
00084             float time;
00085             Vector2D collision;
00086 
00087             int collisionSteps = 0;
00088             while(collisionSteps < MAX_STEPS && timeLeft > 0 &&
00089                     velocity.getLength() > VERY_CLOSE) {
00090 
00091                 /* Update destination. */
00092                 destination = position + velocity;
00093 
00094                 /* A collision occurred. */
00095                 if(collisionDetector->getClosestCollision(
00096                         entity->getRadius(), position, velocity,
00097                         &time, &collision)) {
00098 
00099                     Vector2D newPosition = position;
00100 
00101                     /* Stuck. */
00102                     if(time <= 0.0f) {
00103                         std::cout << "Stuck!" << endl;
00104                         Vector2D correction = -getGravity();
00105                         correction.setLength(VERY_CLOSE);
00106                         newPosition = position + correction;
00107                     } else {
00108                         /* Only update above a certain distance. */
00109                         float distance = (velocity * time).getLength();
00110                         if(distance >= VERY_CLOSE) {
00111                             Vector2D v = velocity;
00112                             v.setLength(distance - VERY_CLOSE);
00113                             newPosition = position + v;
00114                         }
00115                     }
00116 
00117                     /* Subtract used velocity. */
00118                     velocity *= (1.0f - time);
00119 
00120                     /* Add a normal force. */
00121                     Vector2D normalForce = position - collision;
00122                     normalForce.setLength(velocity.getLength());
00123                     velocity += normalForce;
00124 
00125                     /* A little bit of damping. */
00126                     velocity /= 2.0f;
00127  
00128                     /* Update the time and position. */
00129                     position = newPosition;
00130                     timeLeft -= time;
00131                 /* No collision, just update position. */
00132                 } else {
00133                     position = destination;
00134                     timeLeft = 0.0f;
00135                 }
00136 
00137                 /* Keep track of the steps. */
00138                 collisionSteps++;
00139             }
00140 
00141             if(collisionSteps >= MAX_STEPS)
00142                 velocity = Vector2D(0.0f, 0.0f);
00143 
00144             /* Convert velocity back to original scale. */
00145             velocity *= (1.0f / ms);
00146 
00147             /* Determine slipping/falling state. */
00148             entity->setFalling(false);
00149             entity->setSlipping(false);
00150             Vector2D down = getGravity();
00151             down.setLength(VERY_CLOSE * 20.0f);
00152             if(collisionDetector->getClosestCollision(entity->getRadius(),
00153                     position, down, &time, &collision)) {
00154                 Vector2D fall = collision - position;
00155                 float cosine = (getGravity() * fall) /
00156                         (getGravity().getLength() * fall.getLength());
00157                 if(cosine < 1.0f - SLIP_LIMIT || cosine > 1.0f + SLIP_LIMIT)
00158                     entity->setSlipping(true);
00159             } else {
00160                 entity->setFalling(true);
00161             }
00162 
00163             if(entity->isFalling() || entity->isSlipping())
00164                 velocity += getGravity() * ms;
00165 
00166             /* Now set the entity's state. */
00167             entity->setPosition(position);
00168             entity->setVelocity(velocity);
00169         }
00170 
00171         bool CollisionResponsePositioner::canJump()
00172         {
00173             Entity *entity = getEntity();
00174             CollisionDetector *collisionDetector =
00175                     entity->getLevel()->getCollisionDetector();
00176             Vector2D down = getGravity();
00177             float time;
00178             Vector2D collision;
00179 
00180             down.setLength(jumpDistanceLimit);
00181             return collisionDetector->getClosestCollision(entity->getRadius(),
00182                     entity->getPosition(), down, &time, &collision);
00183         }
00184     }
00185 }
